text: Joseph Albert Oliver "Junior" Langlois (November 6, 1934 â€“ September 19, 2020) was a Canadian ice hockey defenceman. Langlois started his National Hockey League career with the Montreal Canadiens in 1958 and ended in 1966 with the Boston Bruins. He also played with the New York Rangers and Detroit Red Wings. Langlois won three Stanley Cups with Montreal, in 1958, 1959 and 1960. He was born in Magog, Quebec. Langlois died on September 19, 2020 in California, aged 85.Langlois dies at 85, was three-time Stanley Cup champion with Canadiens ==References== ==Other websites== * *Al Langlois' Day With the Stanley Cup Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Boston Bruins players Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Detroit Red Wings players Category:Montreal Canadiens players Category:New York Rangers players Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec
title: Al Langlois
